name: Kindle (syne3)
description:
Kindle is an exploration and resource management game in which you run from a daily black wave that will surely kill you, all the while trying to maintain the promises you make to your son each morning.

Collect petrol from ponds and scraps from containers, refuel your lighthouse by sleeping in it.

When you hear the sound cue, the black wave is coming, do not let it touch you!
